name: Weimu
description:
Yukkuri, plan here. 

Eyes, hair, accessories, check. 

So you're going to make Yukkuri, yeah, I spend 3 days making Yukkuri, and it's not completely done yet. 

Intended for fullscreen browser playing, made it WebGL for more accessibility cos who downloads random files from Itch.io into the computer and cos I can, Yay Unity!

Credits:

Zun for starting it all.

Yukkuri people who drew all those comics that entertained me. 

Touhou Music such as Akatsuki Records as well as Metal from AC/DC and other bands that helped me focused throughout the game jam. 

Unity forums that saved me many hours...

"Chewing, Carrot, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
